articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Catfish Farm
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Catfish Farm which put itself on a high scientific, intensive and industrial level.
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the farm, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that it has turned into an eye-opening farm, another wealth conducive to the improvement of people's diet. 
					
					 He showed a high appreciation of the mosaic ''The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il visiting the Pyongyang Catfish Farm'' and monument to the field guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu newly built in the compound of the farm.
					
					 He went round the newly-built room for education in the revolutionary history and room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 Noting that leader Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the farm, he said that he felt numb when he recalled the leader who had worked heart and soul for the improvement of the people's living standard until the last moments of his life.
					
					 Then he toured the combined control room, hatchery, open-air pond and cold storage and other parts of the farm to learn in detail about its production of catfish and modernization.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the farm had a production capacity of more than 900 tons a year in the past but produced more than 1 800 tons of catfish this year, he said that it increased the fish production twice without expanding the area of fish pond, manpower and volume of water, true to the party's policy on the manpower- and water-saving style pisciculture.
					
					 And he said all production and living districts of the farm are impeccable, noting with pleasure that a base for disseminating science and technology and cultural and welfare establishments have been built well at the farm so that its employees can attach importance to science and technology and have deeper affection for their worksite.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the farm, stressing that it should set its goal higher as it has turned into a model and standard one in breeding catfish.
					
					 The Pyongyang Catfish Farm has made admirable achievement when world-startling big successes are reported one after another in the country this year, he said, giving thanks on behalf of the WPK to the officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the relevant field, farm and construction unit who worked feats in the production and project for modernization of the farm.
					
					 He posed for a picture with officials and employees of the farm.
					
					 Accompanying him were Premier of the Cabinet Pak Pong Ju and Secretary O Su Yong and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Iranian Trade Union
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Iranian Trade Union
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Iranian Workers' House.
					 General Secretary Alireza Mahgoub who is heading a delegation of the Iranian Workers' House on a visit to the DPRK, conveyed the gift to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday.

articles.title: Congratulations to President-elect of Tanzania
articles.content:
Congratulations to President-elect of Tanzania
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Johon Magufuli on his election as president of Tanzania. 
					 The message expressed the belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wished him big success in his responsible work for socio-economic prosperity of the country and welfare of its people.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Iranian Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Iranian Delegation
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Iranian Workers' House led by General Secretary Alireza Mahgoub which paid a curtsey call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: Greetings to Malian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Malian FM
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Oct. 28 sent a message of greeting to Abdoulaye Diop, foreign minister of Mali, on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations at ambassadorial level between the DPRK and Mali.
					 The message said that the two countries have developed the ties of close friendship and cooperation in various fields on the road of building a new society over the past more than half a century, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long historic tradition would grow stronger thanks to common efforts.
					
					 It wished him new success in his work for expanding and developing the foreign relations of the country.

articles.title: UN Special Rapporteur's Rubbish about "Forced Labor" of DPRK Workers Assailed
articles.content:
UN Special Rapporteur's Rubbish about "Forced Labor" of DPRK Workers Assailed
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A UN "special rapporteur" for human rights situation in the DPRK at a recent press interview in New York talked rubbish that the DPRK workers overseas do "forced labor".
					 A spokesman for the External Construction Guidance Bureau in a statement Saturday branded it as part of moves for building public opinion and securing justifications at the instructions of the U.S. and other hostile forces keen to railroad another anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the 70th UN General Assembly.
					
					 As for the "special rapporteur," he has a record of having been censured by many countries for not making an apology for his open propaganda that agitated the regime change in a sovereign state while going under the name of UN. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 In the past he had shielded "defectors from the north" and other riff-raffs with no clear identities in the UN arena only to be snubbed as the falsity of information presented by them as regards "human rights" in the DPRK was brought to light. This time he came out with the "human rights situation" of the DPRK workers working overseas in a bid to prolong his remaining days as a cat's-paw of the hostile forces as he faced the dwindling in his living expenses.
					
					 DPRK workers who are working abroad on the principle of voluntary job under legitimate contracts with relevant countries do labor under working and living conditions consistent with international law and domestic laws. They contribute to the economic development and the expansion of economic relations and exchange with other countries.
					
					 It has now become a common thing to exchange labor as well as funds and technology in economic relations among countries and no one can take issue with this.
					
					 It is the behavior of the mentally deranged to describe normal economic exchange as "human rights abuse" and peddle it in the international arena. 
					
					 The "special rapporteur" went vocal about "forced labor" without a clear ground, a senseless logic of branding the employment of labor overseas as "forced labor".
					
					 The UN should no longer remain an on-looker to the reckless behavior of the "special rapporteur" fostering sinister acts by abusing the name of the UN but immediately dismiss him from his post as urged by many countries.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation led by Minister of External Economic Relations Ri Ryong Nam returned home Saturday after visiting Vietnam, Laos and Indonesia.

articles.title: Football Delegation for Reunification of S. Korean Workers Leaves
articles.content:
Football Delegation for Reunification of S. Korean Workers Leaves
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A football delegation for reunification of south Korean workers led by Kim Tong Man, chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea, and Choe Jong Jin, chief vice-chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, left here Saturday after taking part in the football matches of workers in the north and the south for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.

articles.title: Members of Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
Members of Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through Ryanggang Province
Taehongdan, October 31 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of the young vanguard marched through Ryanggang Province on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 The relay group started on the top of Mt. Paektu on Oct. 27 and arrived in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that leader Kim Jong Il was born as the Shining Star of Mt. Paektu and grew up, hearing gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war, members of the relay group looked round historic relics preserved at the secret camp with much care.
					
					 They participated in a pledge-taking meeting of the youth and students of Ryanggang Province held in Hyesan on Oct. 28.
					
					 At the meeting they expressed their firm resolution to successfully glorify the 70th anniversary of the founding of the youth league as a grand festival of the youth of the great Paektusan nation which will demonstrate before the whole world the might of the youth power without an equal in the world.
					
					 The members of the relay group left Hyesan and arrived in Pochonbo. They went round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the then police post of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county office, etc.
					
					 They visited the Samjiyon Grand Monument, the Paektu Museum and various other places in Samjiyon township.
					
					 They went round various places of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station and had a meeting with members of the youth shock brigade.
					
					 At the Taehongdan Revolutionary Battle Site they went round battle sites during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 During the march, they conducted colorful political and cultural events including a meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them and oratorical meeting.

articles.title: Japanese Personages Meet
articles.content:
Japanese Personages Meet
Tokyo, October 30 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of personages of solidarity organizations in Japan who visited the DPRK took place on Oct. 29 in Tokyo.
					 Present there were Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, Yanagisawa Tukuji, deputy chief director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association, Seizaburo Ekuchi, representative of Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, Takao Kamakura, director of the IIJI, Kazuyoshi Hishiki, professor emeritus of Hiroshima Shudo University, and other representatives of solidarity organizations in Japan.
					
					 Present there on invitation were So Chung On, director of the Department for International Affairs and Reunification of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), leading officials of Chongryon organizations and enterprises, Chongryon officials, and personages of solidarity organizations and educational and media circles of Japan.
					
					 The representatives of solidarity organizations in Japan made speeches.
					
					 They said that their participation in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and visit to different places in the DPRK provided them with an opportunity to know well about the spirit of the Korean people who are pushing ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation full of confidence, single-mindedly united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing socialism centered on the popular masses in which they have become genuine masters of the state and society, they stressed.
					
					 A video introducing the exchange of students of the two countries was shown at the meeting.

articles.title: 2015 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
2015 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The 2015 inter-provincial mass sports contest closed. It opened in Pyongyang on October 22.
					 There were the finals of women's volleyball, amusement, Korean wrestling, tug-of-war and Taekwon-do demonstration at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Oct. 31.
					
					 Among the spectators were chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, members of the cheer-leading squads, and working people, youth and students in the city.
					
					 The total standings were announced. 
					
					 Pyongyang City came first, grabbing a rotating trophy cup.

articles.title: Kanghung Liquid Compound Fertilizer
articles.content:
Kanghung Liquid Compound Fertilizer
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kanghung liquid compound fertilizer, produced in the DPRK, has been proved effective in boosting agricultural production.
					 In recent years, it has been applied to co-op farms in North Hwanghae Province as well as many units in the fields of city management and land and environment protection.
					
					 It should be diluted with water before spraying on plants. And three kilograms of undiluted fertilizer is enough for a hectare, taking effect better than that of 100 kilograms of ammonium sulphate fertilizer.
					
					 It contains amino acid, humic acid, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, microelements and light rare earth elements.
					
					 According to an official of the Ministry of Agriculture, the liquid fertilizer is more effective than organomineral compound fertilizer produced by other countries.

articles.title: History of Sports Development Adorned with Gold Medals
articles.content:
History of Sports Development Adorned with Gold Medals
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- It was on November 1, Juche 34 (1945) that the Sports Union of North Korea was formed.
					 Since then, the DPRK has made praiseworthy progress in the field of sports under the wise leadership of peerlessly great persons. It can be well evidenced by over 100 gold medals the DPRK athletes have won in world championships and Olympic games.
					
					 In the 1960s, Ri Hung Chon renewed the world records for two times in men's weightlifting and Sin Kum Dan set new world records for 11 times in international women's track and field tournaments.
					
					 In the 1970s, Ri Ho Jun brought the first Olympic gold medal to the country by taking the first place in a shooting event, Pak Yong Sun won the women's singles title in two consecutive world table-tennis championships and Ku Yong Jo emerged as a typical boxer.
					
					 In the 1980s and 1990s, many gold medalists, including twice world champion and twice holder of the Olympic gold medal, had been produced in such events as wrestling, weightlifting, shooting and heavy gymnastics.
					
					 In the new century, too, signal successes have been achieved.
					
					 The DPRK girls won victories for three times respectively in the Asian Women's Football Championships and women's football event of the Asian Games and took the title in two consecutive EAFF Women's East Asia Cup and in FIFA U-20 and U-17 women's world cups.
					
					 Among the well-known world champions produced by the DPRK are Judoist Kye Sun Hui, wrestler Yang Kyong Il , boxers Ri Jong Hyang and Yun Kum Ju, weightlifters Kim Un Kuk and Om Yun Chol and gymnast Hong Un Jong.
					
					 The DPRK athletes added glory to the country by clinching gold medals in the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events) and the 16th FINA World Championships.
					
					 Over the past 70 years, many athletes including gold medalists were awarded Kim Il Sung Prize and Kim Jong Il Prize, the titles of the DPRK Hero and Labor Hero and the titles of People's Athlete and Merited Athlete.

articles.title: Full-Length Novel "Morning Shines" Produced
articles.content:
Full-Length Novel "Morning Shines" Produced
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The April 15 Literary Production Centre produced the full-length novel "Morning Shines".
					 The novel, part of the serial "Immortal Guidance", was written by Rim Pong Chol is set in the period from the late 1980s when all the people of the country waged a high-pitched drive to successfully carry out the third seven-year plan in hearty response to the letter sent by the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of the 40th founding anniversary of the DPRK to 2010.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il advance a strategic policy to develop the machine-building industry on a new high stage and work heart and soul to implement it.
					
					 The country's economic construction, however, faces a stern trial as it has to make the Arduous March, the forced march due to the collapse of east European socialist countries, the imperialists' vicious economic blockade against the DPRK, the DPRK-U.S. nuclear stand-off and consecutive years of natural disasters,
					
					 In the period of stern trial Kim Jong Il makes a bold decision to put  the machine-building industry on a new higher stage by channeling all economic potentials of the country.
					
					 After starting the forced march of history, he ushers in a new history of Korean-style CNC and a new era of breaking through the cutting edge of science and technology with his iron will and courage and patriotic devotion. 
					
					 The novel tells stories eloquently proving his revolutionary comradeship including touching facts about how he enables revolutionary comrades to enjoy eternal lives and leads ordinary scientists and technicians to bear the brunt of the drive for breaking through the cutting edge of science and technology. 
					
					 It makes a truthful depiction of the Korean people's noble spiritual world remaining true to his leadership despite any difficulty and hardship.

articles.title: Ultra-modern Sci-tech Presentation and Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Ultra-modern Sci-tech Presentation and Exhibition Held
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- An ultra-modern sci-tech presentation and ultra-modern technological products exhibition of Kim Chaek University of Technology took place from Oct. 29 to 31.
					 It brought together teachers, researchers and postgraduates of the university. The presentation was divided into 8 panels including measuring analysis panel, basic science panel and new material panel, and exhibition into four panels including IT panel and machine panel.
					
					 The participants heard at least 160 papers dealing with latest scientific research achievements. Displayed at the exhibition were more than 120 ultra-modern technological products conducive to developing economy and improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: Kim Man Yu Hospital
articles.content:
Kim Man Yu Hospital
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Man Yu Hospital in Pyongyang has achieved noteworthy surgical achievements.
					 Medical teams of the hospital succeeded in applying latest operation methods like thoracolaparotomy, esophagoplasty and thoracoplasty.
					
					 Meanwhile, various medical apparatuses have been made to prove their high effectiveness in clinical practices.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Opt for Signing Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Opt for Signing Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The issue of ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula has become a focus of the international community at present.
					 This is because peace and security on the peninsula are very important and vital for the destiny of humankind.
					
					 In last August the situation reached the brink of a war due to a minor incident which occurred for an unknown reason. This made the world community feel once again the urgent need to ensure peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The incident is just the tip of the iceberg of unstable incidents that are attributable to the Korean Armistice Agreement which exists in name only.
					
					 Peace has not yet settled on the peninsula though 60 years have passed since the conclusion of the AA.
					
					 The contradiction and conflict between the DPRK and the U.S. have escalated and an unstable situation has persisted on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Now huge forces level their guns at each other with the Military Demarcation Line in between on the peninsula. Ceaseless military exercises under various codenames are being staged by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 The peace on the peninsula is fragile.
					
					 The conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty is an important issue for ensuring world peace and security.
					
					 The interests of big powers are geo-politically intertwined in Northeast Asia. A new world war may break out in this part of world as huge military forces are deployed and it has tremendous economic potentials.
					
					 The ever-increasing tension on the peninsula may spark a war any moment and the war can spill over into a global nuclear war straight away.
					
					 A basic way of preventing this serious situation is to replace the outdated AA by a new peace treaty at an early date and establish lasting peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The replacement of the AA by a peace treaty is a key to settling the issue and a unique way of ensuring durable peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 As the DPRK did in the past, it officially clarified its stand to replace the AA with a peace treaty and requested the U.S. to opt for the conclusion of the peace treaty in the light of the gravity of the present situation on a series of occasions including the 70th UN General Assembly. .
					
					 The U.S. was the main party to the AA.
					
					 The U.S. is the de factor ruler of south Korea and it has the prerogative of command over its army.
					
					 Dialogue to be held between the DPRK and the U.S., long-time belligerent parties, should be substantial negotiations targeting the defusing of hostility, not dialogue for mere form's sake aimed at "stable management of situation". 
					
					 The U.S. should make a proper choice, pondering over the proposal of the DPRK and show before the international community its will for settling the issue of the peninsula and ensuring regional peace.
					
					 If the U.S. makes a bold switchover in its policy, the security environment of the peninsula will witness a dramatic change and the U.S. will also be cleared of its security concerns.
					
					 The U.S. should understand the changed situation. It should never doubt the DPRK's nuclear capability to defend itself from former's nuclear attack.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula has entered into an important phase of change.
					
					 The world is closely watching how the U.S. approaches the issue of concluding the peace treaty.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying 7th Congress of WPK as Greatest Heyday in History of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying 7th Congress of WPK as Greatest Heyday in History of WPK
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- To convene the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is a historic event of epochal significance in the development of the WPK and the revolution, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The 7th Congress of the WPK will be a historic milestone of great significance in hastening the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche by developing the WPK into the party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and increasing its leadership role.
					
					 Through the 7th Congress the WPK will more powerfully demonstrate the dignity and might as the revolutionary party of Juche which steers the revolution and construction to victory the way President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il did, regarding their idea and feats as the lifeline for party building and activities no matter how much water flows under the bridge.
					
					 Upon hearing about the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK to convene the 7th Congress, all the service personnel and people feel high pride and honor of advancing toward the final victory under the leadership of the great leader and the great party.
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people should turn out to greet the 7th Congress of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and remarkable labor achievements as the congress will be convened at an exciting period when the party's dignity, leadership prestige and militant might are rising higher than before.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all Koreans to unite close around the Central Committed of the WPK headed by respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and glorify the 7th Congress of the WPK as the greatest heyday of the revolution in the history of the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article denounces the south Korean authorities for working hard to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in league with foreign forces while lending a deaf ear to its advise to keep the situation stable and facilitate the process for improving the inter-Korean relations through dialogue and cooperation.
					 The south Korean authorities' persistent moves for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north are a basic factor of hamstringing the efforts to mend the inter-Korean relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 They remain unchanged in their bad habit of standing in confrontation even after the north-south high-level urgent contact took place.
					
					 Their behavior makes the DPRK suspect whether they want dialogue, cooperation and improved relations between the north and the south or not.
					
					 "Unification of social systems" is the final goal of their "policy toward the north" and confrontational racket as they are seized by inveterate repugnancy toward the fellow countrymen in the north and hostility.
					
					 They have never given up their attempt to hurt the dignified social system of the DPRK.
					
					 It is due to this wrong attitude and reckless confrontation of the south Korean authorities that the hard-won atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations is being chilled and tension is increasing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They should drop their daggers hidden behind their belts and opt for defusing tension and improving inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the south Korean ruling forces scupper the opportunity of improving inter-Korean relations, they will always stand cursed by all Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Staging War Maneuvers Contrary to Trend of North-South Reconciliation
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Staging War Maneuvers Contrary to Trend of North-South Reconciliation
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary lashes out at the south Korean military forces for staging madcap war maneuvers for aggression in league with foreign forces quite contrary to the atmosphere of dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south. 
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean army staged large-scale joint naval maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea from Oct. 26 to 29. Involved there were five warships including U.S. nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan, and at least 20 warships including Aegis destroyers, P-3 sea patrol planes and other planes of the south Korean army.
					
					 They staged frantic anti-warship warfare, anti-aircraft warfare, anti-submarine warfare, anti-mine warfare, operation training of anti-special warfare unit, landing operation training, etc. under the pretext of "improving joint defense capability"
					
					 This is a revelation of the south Korean warmongers' dangerous scenario to deliberately aggravate the situation on the Korean Peninsula, stem the trend of the north-south reconciliation and realize their ambition for invading the north at any cost in league with foreign forces, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations witnessed the repetition of the evil cycle of failure of dialogue and escalating confrontation in the past entirely because the south Korean authorities committed reckless saber-rattling against the DPRK in conspiracy and league with foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers' persistent military provocations are aimed to chill the atmosphere of improving inter-Korean relations and derail the process of implementing the north-south agreement.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are now standing at crossroads.
					
					 Whether the agreement will lead to dialogue and cooperation or not entirely hinges on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Introduce "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Introduce "State-compiled History Textbooks"
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Oct. 29 carried an editorial titled "Reckless remarks that 'opposition to state-compiled history textbooks' is the instruction of the north".
					 The editorial recalled that Ri Jong Hyon, lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party", one of the closest confidants of the chief executive, on Oct. 28 made absurd remarks that a campaign against the "state-compiled" history textbooks" is aimed to "conduct education in communizing the south."
					
					 He defined textbooks many students study at present as "ones for communizing the south" and openly labeled those opposing "state-compiled history textbooks" as "dishonest elements", the editorial charged.
					
					 This is reminiscent of McCarthyism against communism in the past century, it said, adding it is anachronistic to label the campaign against "state-compiled history textbooks" as a communist one.
					
					 It said that it is not the baseless and counter-productive "instruction from the north" that divides the people but the "president" as she is trying to introduce "state-compiled history textbooks" going against the people's mindset.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Vociferating about "Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Vociferating about "Followers of North"
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Ruling forces' row about followers of the north kicked off again" was posted on Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea on Oct. 30.
					 Lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" and other ruling forces in south Korea are letting loose a string of spate that the existing history textbooks are "ones for education in unification by communizing the south" and a campaign against "state-compiled history textbooks" is conducted "on the instruction from the north", the editorial said.
					
					 The ruling forces' remarks about "followers of the north" revealed their spiritual world, understanding of reality and political purpose, it noted.
					
					 "Followers of the north" touted by them is nothing but specter, it said, condemning the ruling forces for working hard to make their trumpeting about "followers of the north" sound plausible in a bid to attain their political purpose.
					
					 It is essential to put an end to the row about "followers of the north", it stressed.

articles.title: Stop to War Drills Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to War Drills Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Residents and members of civic and social organizations in Kwangju, south Korea held a press conference before the gate of the first combat flying corps of the Air Force in Kwangsan District, Kwangju on Oct. 29 in protest against the anti-DPRK war drills kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers.
					 Speakers rapped the U.S. and south Korean military for mulling staging joint air force drills from November 2 to 6.
					
					 They demanded a stop to war drills escalating military tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: General Strike against Anti-Worker Policy Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike against Anti-Worker Policy Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Public Health and Medical Trade Union of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Oct. 29 to declare an action against the authorities' anti-worker policy and for workers' rights to existence.
					 The organization accused the regime of working hard to retrogressively revise the structure of labor market in the field of healthcare and at public institutions across south Korea by an illegal way.
					
					 It would call a general strike against the regime's anti-worker policy, it stressed.
					
					 Leading members of the organization had their hair cut short in protest against the authorities' retrogressive revision of the structure of labor market.
					
					 A resolution was read out there.
					
					 It said that the authorities' retrogressive revision of the structure of the labor mark is a great disaster as it worsens the situation of employment and payment, labor conditions and labor-management relations.
					
					 The "measure for normalizing public organizations" serves as means for havocking the public nature of healthcare and threatening the workers' rights to existence.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Demand S. Korean Authorities Halt Military Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Demand S. Korean Authorities Halt Military Provocations against DPRK
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Oct. 26 in support of a statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The joint statement accused the south Korean military warmongers of committing such grave military provocation against the DPRK as recklessly firing shells at the latter's patrol boat on a routine marine duty.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The warmongers' shelling was a deliberate provocation for escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula once again by sparking a military clash in the sensitive waters of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 What was more dangerous was that such reckless shelling was timed to coincide with such madcap war drills as joint naval maneuver and  Hoguk exercises the south Korean military warmongers kicked off with a U.S. nuclear carrier involved. 
					
					 The reckless provocation was perpetrated at a time when the reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south was under way at the Mt. Kumgang Resort, an act of challenging the expectation of the Korean nation towards the sustainable improvement of the north-south relations and the country's reunification.
					
					 The south Korean military reacted to the DPRK's positive measure for detente with reckless shelling, bringing to light its true colors as provocateurs.
					
					 The statement urged the warmongers to halt the military provocation against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats Praised by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats Praised by Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- HE Kim Jong Il, gifted thinker and theoretician, outstanding strategist and brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, successfully carried forward and developed the idea and cause of the great President Kim Il Sung.
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a tender-hearted father of the Korean people who dedicated his all to their happiness to the last moments of his life, regarding it as his motto to believe in people as in heaven.
					
					 This was pointed out in a statement adopted at an inaugural ceremony of the Swiss committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il held in Basel on Oct. 26.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, true to the three charters for national reunification set forth by the President, and thus ushered in a new era of the movement for Korea's reunification advancing under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics the DPRK emerged a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Switzerland
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A Swiss committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed in Basel on Oct. 26.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce Kim Jong Il's works and great exploits through internet and organize political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, film show and seminar from Nov. 1 to Dec. 18.

articles.title: DIU Introduced by Guinean Radios
articles.content:
DIU Introduced by Guinean Radios
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Guinean radios introduced the historical roots of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on October 19 on the occasion of the 89th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The domestic radio of Guinea said: The WPK, which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people, could strike its roots after President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU on Oct. 17, 1926.
					
					 The formation of the DIU marked a historical event of particular signification in the destiny of the Korean people and modern history of Korea. 
					
					 The programme of the DIU based on the transparent idea of independence against imperialism became a basis and a basic groundwork of the programme of the WPK.
					
					 The principle of independence, the idea of the DIU, serves as unshakable guidelines for the building of the WPK and its activities. 
					
					 The WPK is successfully carrying forward the banner of unity held aloft by the DIU.
					
					 The international radio of Guinea aired the same program.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Piscifactoria de Siluros de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Piscifactoria de Siluros de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Piscifactoria de Siluros de Pyongyang, que realizo en alto nivel la cientifizacion, intensificacion e industrializacion.
					Viendo el panorama de la fabrica, expreso una gran alegria diciendo que la planta se ha convertido en la nueva que no puede encontrarse con el aspecto del pasado y en la mas gallarda y agrego que se ha preparado otra hacienda que puede contribuir a la mejora de vida alimentaria del pueblo.
					
					Al mirar el mural de mosaico "Gran Dirigente, companero  Kim Jong Il dirigiendo en el terreno la Piscifactoria de Siluros de Pyongyang" levantado de nuevo en el recinto y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los grandes hombres sinpares del monte Paektu, senalo que los funcionarios y los empleados de la planta los construyeron bien.
					
					El Mariscal estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Subrayo que la piscifactoria es una de las fabricas a que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prestaba gran atencion y dijo que un gran dolor le oprime al pensar en el quien hasta ultimos momentos de su vida se preocupo y dedico todo lo suyo por la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Recorriendo la sala de mando general, el edificio de incubacion, el estanque al aire libre, el refrigerador y otros puntos, se entero de los detalles del proceso de la produccion de siluros y la modernizacion de la fabrica.
					
					La planta, que en el periodo pasado la cantidad de produccion se limitaba a mas de 900 toneladas, alcanzo exitos asombrosos de producir este ano mas de mil 800 toneladas de siluros, menciono y continuo que, en particular, en pleno acato a la orientacion del partido de hacer la cria de peces con poca mano de obra y pocas aguas incremento en dos veces la cantidad de produccion sin aumentar el area de estanque, ni la mano de obra, ni la cantidad de aguas.
					
					Acondicionaron bien la base divulgadora de ciencias y tecnicas y los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico para que los empleados de la planta den gran importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas y tengan el sentimiento de carino hacia el lugar de trabajo, senalo y anadio que son perfectas todas las zonas de produccion y de vida de la piscifactoria.
					
					Ahora, cuando la planta se convirtio en un ejemplar de la cria de siluros y fabrica de modelo, debe presentar la meta mas elevada y esforzarse por cumplirla senalo y presento las tareas para la fabrica.
					
					En este ano cuando se crean uno tras otro los exitos asombrosos en este territorio, la fabrica tambien registro orgullosos logros milagrosos, dijo y les dio agradecimiento en nombre del PTC a las ramas y fabricas correspondientes, funcionarios de la unidad de la construccion, cientificos, tecnicos y obreros, que realizaron proezas laborales en la produccion y la obra de modernizacion.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto a los funcionarios y empleados de la piscifactoria.
					
					Le acompanaron el premier Pak Pong Ju, el secretario del CC del PTC O Su Yong y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de entidad irani
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de entidad irani
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le enviara la Casa de los Trabajadores de Iran.
					Alireza Mahgoub, secretario general y jefe de la delegacion de la entidad sindical de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 31 a Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Tanzania
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion al electo presidente de la Republica Unida de Tanzania, Johon Magufuli.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las largas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en lo adelante y desea de todo corazon al destinatario grandes exitos en su trabajo responsable para la prosperidad socioeconomica del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Direccion de Construccion en Extranjero de Corea comenta peroratas de "informador especial"
articles.content:
Direccion de Construccion en Extranjero de Corea comenta peroratas de "informador especial"
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- En una rueda de prensa ofrecida hace poco en Nueva York, el "informador especial" de la ONU sobre la situacion de DDHH de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dijo absurdamente que los trabajadores de la RPDC enviados a ultramar se enfrentan a "trabajo forzoso".
					En su declaracion fechada 31, el portavoz de la Direccion de Construccion en el Extranjero de Corea lo rechazo calificandolo de un eslabon de creacion de una opinion publica bajo la manipulacion de Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles tendientes a aprobar por coercion un "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en la plenaria del 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					El "informador especial" fue un tipejo quien en el pasado, poniendose la gorra de la ONU, agito abiertamente el derrumbe del regimen de un Estado soberano, con lo cual recibio una mirada feroz y penetrante de muchos paises por su conducto descarado, senala el documento y continua:
					
					Al abogar en la escena de la ONU por las morrallas extranas inclusive los "fugitivos norcoreanos", el "informador especial" se avergonzo a causa de la revelacion de la falsedad de los datos de censura de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, razon por la cual se disminuyeron los gastos para la subsistencia.
					
					Asi, a fin de mantener su vida restante, el lacayo de las fuerzas hostiles acuso esta vez la "situacion de DDHH" de los trabajadores de la RPDC en ultramar.
					
					Segun el convenio legal de los paises correspondientes y los principios de voluntariedad, nuestros trabajadores despachados a ultramar se esfuerzan por el desarrollo economico del pais y la ampliacion del intercambio de la economia con el extranjero, trabajando bajo la situacion de trabajo y vida convenientes a la ley internacional y la nacional.
					
					Hoy en dia, en las relaciones economicas entre los paises, el intercambio mutuo de fondos, tecnologia y mano de obra devienen una realidad universal. Por lo tanto, nadie puede cuestionarlo.
					
					Calificar tal intercambio economico normal de "violacion de DDHH" y acusarlo en la escena internacional es el comportamiento de psicopata que vive fuera de este mundo.
					
					La ONU no debe estar por mas tiempo con brazos cruzados ante tal locura del "informador especial" que abusa del nombre de la ONU y debe eliminarlo de acuerdo con la demanda de muchos paises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte a autoridades surcoreanas no perder oportunidad
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte a autoridades surcoreanas no perder oportunidad
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncia a las autoridades surcoreanas que recurren con frenesi a la campana conflictiva anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas despreciando la advertencia de la parte connacional de fomentar la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo y cooperacion y controlando con estabilidad la situacion. 
					La campana conflictiva de las autoridades surcoreanas constituye el factor fundamental que impide la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, revela el articulo y prosigue:
					
					El vicio de enfrentamiento de ellas no se ha cambiado aun despues del contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur. 
					
					Sus actos hacen sospechar si ellas mismas desean o no el dialogo, la cooperacion y la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					La "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" es la meta final de la "politica sobre el Norte" y el alboroto conflictivo de los gobernantes surcoreanos colmados de arraigado veto y hostilidad a la parte connacional. 
					
					Ellas no abandonaron ni una vez el intento de derrocar el regimen prestigioso de la RPDC. 
					
					Debido a su imprudencia, se agrava la situacion y vuelve a entenebrecerse el ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas preparado a duras penas. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben hacer esfuerzos por aliviar la situacion y mejorar los vinculos Norte-Sur. 
					
					Si los gobernantes surcoreanos abandonan como zapatos viejos la oportunidad de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, seran repudiadas y rechazadas por toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza alboroto belico anti-RPDC de circulo militar surcoreano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza alboroto belico anti-RPDC de circulo militar surcoreano
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ahora las autoridades militares del Sur de Corea libran un alboroto belico en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras nadando en contra del ambiente favorable al dialogo y cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado en su edicion de este sabado y prosigue:
					
					En los ejercicios combinados maritimos moviles desarrollados desde el dia 26 hasta el 29 en el Mar Este de Corea por parte de las tropas norteamericanas y el ejercito surcoreano, se introdujeron 5 buques de guerra norteamericanos incluso el portaaviones nuclear Ronald Reagan, mas de 20 buques surcoreanos inclusive el destructor Aegis, el avion de patrulla naval P-3 y otros. 
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos desplegaron freneticamente los simulacros antibuques, antiaereos, antisubmarinos y antiminas, el entrenamiento operacional de unidades especiales, el desembarco, etc. 
					
					Esto es la expresion del aventurero intento de impedir la reconciliacion Norte-Sur mediante la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr a toda costa la ambicion de agresion a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					En el tiempo pasado, las relaciones intercoreanas repitieron la circulacion viciosa del fracaso de dialogo y de agravacion de confrontacion, debido a los alborotos belicos anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Las incesantes provocaciones militares de los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano parten del malsano intento de romper el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas e impedir la ejecucion del acuerdo Norte-Sur. 
					
					Ahora las relaciones intercoreanas se encuentran en el dilema: marchar o no hacia el dialogo y la cooperacion. 
					
					Esto depende enteramente de la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.
